text:
Three swim to safety

Five minors on Sunday drowned while three others swam to safety when a boat carrying 13 children capsized at Sigraila ‘chaur’ (low land area filled with water) in Kumhar Sang village in Bihar's Begusarai district.

Search on for 5

The five bodies have been fished out and divers have been pressed into service to look for the remaining five children, a police officer said.

The 13 children, residents of Kumhar Sang village, had gone boating for recreation when the accident occurred, he said.

The deceased have been identified as Rupam Kumari (8), Abhishek Kumar (10), Jhitni Kumari (12), Chhotki Kumari (8) and Sachin Kumar (10), the police officer said.

Deputy Superintendent of Police Virendra Kumar had reached the spot of the accident and was overseeing the rescue operation, he added.
title: Five children drown as boat capsizes in Bihar
